message: We were bad and forgot to organize this until the absolute last minute, so we've slapped it in Soma to try and catch people coming out of work (namely us at Twitter, but y'know…) Pirate theme next month maybe, assuming we can verify that they have some beer available. http://t.co/FCRJVyD
Little test of the new embedded Tweet feature that's been added: http://twitter.com/BenWard/status/53631185628315649
I was going to go home early and do laundry tonight, but then I ended up losing track of time, and now the laundromat is closed.
All that is to say: I think I'm going to make it to Substandards :)
And the upstanding Mr Dan Webb, fellow Pub Standards diplomat, is responsible for the name.
It was a good time last night, thanks for setting it up!
yeah, I wish I could have stayed :(
